      • mSceneCachingEnabled

        private boolean mSceneCachingEnabled
        Scene caching stores all textures and relevant OpenGL-specific data. This is used when the OpenGL context needs to be restored. The context typically needs to be restored when the application is re-activated or when a live wallpaper is rotated.

      • mSceneInitialized

        protected boolean mSceneInitialized

      • supportsUIntBuffers

        public static boolean supportsUIntBuffers

      • mSceneQueue

        private java.util.LinkedList<AFrameTask> mSceneQueue
        Frame task queue. Adding, removing or replacing scenes is prohibited outside the use of this queue. The render thread will automatically handle the necessary operations at an appropriate time, ensuring thread safety and general correct operation. Guarded by mSceneQueue

      • mScenes

        private java.util.List<RajawaliScene> mScenes

      • mCurrentScene

        private RajawaliScene mCurrentScene
        The scene currently being displayed. Guarded by mNextSceneLock

      • mNextScene

        private RajawaliScene mNextScene

      • mNextSceneLock

        private final java.lang.Object mNextSceneLock

      • mEffectComposer

        protected EffectComposer mEffectComposer
        Effect composer for post processing. If the effect composer is empty, RajawaliRenderer will render the scene normally to screen. If there are APass instances in the composer list, it will skip rendering the current scene and call render on the effect composer instead which will handle scene render passes of its own.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • switchScene

        public void switchScene(RajawaliScene scene)
        Switches the RajawaliScene currently being displayed.
        Parameters:
        scene - RajawaliScene object to display.

      • switchScene

        public void switchScene(int scene)
        Switches the RajawaliScene currently being displayed.
        Parameters:
        scene - Index of the RajawaliScene to use.

      • getCurrentScene

        public RajawaliScene getCurrentScene()
        Fetches the RajawaliScene currently being being displayed. Note that the scene is not thread safe so this should be used with extreme caution.
        Returns:
        RajawaliScene object currently used for the scene.
        See Also:
        RajawaliRenderer#mCurrentScene}

      • getScene

        public RajawaliScene getScene(int scene)
        Fetches the specified scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - Index of the RajawaliScene to fetch.
        Returns:
        RajawaliScene which was retrieved.

      • replaceScene

        public boolean replaceScene(RajawaliScene scene,
                   int location)
        Replaces a RajawaliScene in the renderer at the specified location in the list. This does not validate the index, so if it is not contained in the list already, an exception will be thrown. If the RajawaliScene being replaced is the one in current use, the replacement will be selected on the next frame.
        Parameters:
        scene - RajawaliScene object to add.
        location - Integer index of the RajawaliScene to replace.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the replace task was successfully queued.

      • replaceScene

        public boolean replaceScene(RajawaliScene oldScene,
                   RajawaliScene newScene)
        Replaces the specified RajawaliScene in the renderer with the new one. If the RajawaliScene being replaced is the one in current use, the replacement will be selected on the next frame.
        Parameters:
        oldScene - RajawaliScene object to be replaced.
        newScene - RajawaliScene which will replace the old.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the replace task was successfully queued.

      • addScene

        public boolean addScene(RajawaliScene scene)
        Adds a RajawaliScene to the renderer.
        Parameters:
        scene - RajawaliScene object to add.
        Returns:
        boolean True if this addition was successfully queued.

      • addScenes

        public boolean addScenes(java.util.Collection<RajawaliScene> scenes)
        Adds a Collection of scenes to the renderer.
        Parameters:
        scenes - Collection of scenes to be added.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the addition was successfully queued.

      • removeScene

        public boolean removeScene(RajawaliScene scene)
        Removes a RajawaliScene from the renderer. If the RajawaliScene being removed is the one in current use, the 0 index RajawaliScene will be selected on the next frame.
        Parameters:
        scene - RajawaliScene object to be removed.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the removal was successfully queued.

      • clearScenes

        protected void clearScenes()
        Clears all scenes from the renderer. This should be used with extreme care as it will also clear the current scene. If this is done while still rendering, bad things will happen.

      • addAndSwitchScene

        public boolean addAndSwitchScene(RajawaliScene scene)
        Adds a RajawaliScene, switching to it immediately
        Parameters:
        scene - The RajawaliScene to add.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the addition task was successfully queued.

      • replaceAndSwitchScene

        public boolean replaceAndSwitchScene(RajawaliScene scene,
                            int location)
        Replaces a RajawaliScene at the specified index, switching to the replacement immediately on the next frame. This does not validate the index.
        Parameters:
        scene - The RajawaliScene to add.
        location - The index of the scene to replace.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the replace task was successfully queued.

      • replaceAndSwitchScene

        public boolean replaceAndSwitchScene(RajawaliScene oldScene,
                            RajawaliScene newScene)
        Replaces the specified RajawaliScene in the renderer with the new one, switching to it immediately on the next frame. If the scene to replace does not exist, nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        oldScene - RajawaliScene object to be replaced.
        newScene - RajawaliScene which will replace the old.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the replace task was successfully queued.

      • registerAnimation

        public boolean registerAnimation(Animation3D anim)
        Register an animation to be managed by the current scene. This is optional leaving open the possibility to manage updates on Animations in your own implementation.
        Parameters:
        anim - Animation3D to be registered.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the registration was queued successfully.

      • unregisterAnimation

        public boolean unregisterAnimation(Animation3D anim)
        Remove a managed animation. If the animation is not a member of the current scene, nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        anim - Animation3D to be unregistered.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the unregister was queued successfully.

      • getCurrentCamera

        public Camera getCurrentCamera()
        Retrieve the current Camera in use. This is the camera being used by the current scene.
        Returns:
        Camera currently in use.

        Adds a Camera to the current scene.
        Parameters:
        camera - Camera to add.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the addition was queued successfully.

                             Camera newCamera)

                             int index)

        Parameters:

        index - The integer index of the camera to replace.

      • removeCamera

        public boolean removeCamera(Camera camera)

        Parameters:
        camera - Camera to remove.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the removal was queued successfully.

        Returns:
        boolean True on successful addition to queue.

      • performFrameTasks

        private void performFrameTasks()
        Internal method for performing frame tasks. Should be called at the start of onDrawFrame() prior to render().

      • internalReplaceScene

        private void internalReplaceScene(AFrameTask scene,
                        RajawaliScene replace,
                        int index)
        Internal method for replacing a RajawaliScene object. If index is AFrameTask.UNUSED_INDEX then it will be used, otherwise the replace object is used. Should only be called through handleAddTask(AFrameTask)
        Parameters:
        scene - AFrameTask The old scene.
        replace - RajawaliScene The scene replacing the old scene.
        index - integer index to effect. Set to AFrameTask.UNUSED_INDEX if not used.

      • internalReplaceTexture

        private void internalReplaceTexture(ATexture textureConfig,
                          int index)
        Internal method for replacing a ATexture object. Should only be called through handleAddTask(AFrameTask)
        Parameters:
        texture - ATexture The texture to be replaced.
        index - integer index to effect. Set to AFrameTask.UNUSED_INDEX if not used.

      • internalAddScene

        private void internalAddScene(RajawaliScene scene,
                    int index)
        Internal method for adding RajawaliScene objects. Should only be called through handleAddTask(AFrameTask) This takes an index for the addition, but it is pretty meaningless.
        Parameters:
        scene - RajawaliScene to add.
        int - index to add the animation at.

      • internalAddTexture

        private void internalAddTexture(ATexture textureConfig,
                      int index)
        Internal method for adding ATexture objects. Should only be called through handleAddTask(AFrameTask) This takes an index for the addition, but it is pretty meaningless.
        Parameters:
        texture - ATexture to add.
        int - index to add the animation at.

      • internalAddMaterial

        private void internalAddMaterial(Material material,
                       int index)
        Internal method for adding Material objects. Should only be called through handleAddTask(AFrameTask) This takes an index for the addition, but it is pretty meaningless.
        Parameters:
        material - Material to add.
        int - index to add the animation at.

      • internalRemoveScene

        private void internalRemoveScene(RajawaliScene scene,
                       int index)
        Internal method for removing RajawaliScene objects. Should only be called through handleRemoveTask(AFrameTask) This takes an index for the removal.
        Parameters:
        anim - RajawaliScene to remove. If index is used, this is ignored.
        index - integer index to remove the child at.

      • internalRemoveTexture

        private void internalRemoveTexture(ATexture texture,
                         int index)

      • internalRemoveMaterial

        private void internalRemoveMaterial(Material material,
                          int index)

      • internalClearScenes

        private void internalClearScenes()
        Internal method for removing all RajawaliScene objects. Should only be called through handleRemoveAllTask(AFrameTask)

      • internalReloadTextureManager

        private void internalReloadTextureManager()
        Internal method for reloading the TextureManager.reload() texture manager. Should only be called through handleReloadTask(AFrameTask)

      • internalReloadMaterialManager

        private void internalReloadMaterialManager()
        Internal method for reloading the MaterialManager.reload() material manager. Should only be called through handleReloadTask(AFrameTask)

      • internalResetTextureManager

        private void internalResetTextureManager()
        Internal method for resetting the TextureManager.reset() texture manager. Should only be called through handleReloadTask(AFrameTask)

      • internalResetMaterialManager

        private void internalResetMaterialManager()
        Internal method for resetting the MaterialManager.reset() material manager. Should only be called through handleReloadTask(AFrameTask)

      • queueAddTask

        public boolean queueAddTask(AFrameTask task)
        Queue an addition task. The added object will be placed at the end of the renderer's list.
        Parameters:
        task - AFrameTask to be added.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueAddTask

        public boolean queueAddTask(AFrameTask task,
                   int index)
        Queue an addition task. The added object will be placed at the specified index in the renderer's list, or the end if out of range.
        Parameters:
        task - AFrameTask to be added.
        index - Integer index to place the object at.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueRemoveTask

        public boolean queueRemoveTask(AFrameTask.TYPE type,
                      int index)
        Queue a removal task. The removal will occur at the specified index, or at the end of the list if out of range.
        Parameters:
        type - AFrameTask.TYPE Which list to remove from.
        index - Integer index to remove the object at.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueRemoveTask

        public boolean queueRemoveTask(AFrameTask task)
        Queue a removal task to remove the specified object.
        Parameters:
        task - AFrameTask to be removed.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueReplaceTask

        public boolean queueReplaceTask(int index,
                       AFrameTask replacement)
        Queue a replacement task to replace the object at the specified index with a new one. Replaces the object at the end of the list if index is out of range.
        Parameters:
        index - Integer index of the object to replace.
        replacement - AFrameTask the object replacing the old.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueReplaceTask

        public boolean queueReplaceTask(AFrameTask task,
                       AFrameTask replacement)
        Queue a replacement task to replace the specified object with the new one.
        Parameters:
        task - AFrameTask the object to replace.
        replacement - AFrameTask the object replacing the old.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueAddAllTask

        public boolean queueAddAllTask(java.util.Collection<AFrameTask> collection)
        Queue an add all task to add all objects from the given collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection containing all the objects to add.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

      • queueClearTask

        public boolean queueClearTask(AFrameTask.TYPE type)
        Queue a remove all task which will clear the related list.
        Parameters:
        type - AFrameTask.TYPE Which object list to clear (Cameras, BaseObject3D, etc)
        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

        public boolean queueReloadTask(AFrameTask task)
        Queue a reload task. The added object will be reloaded.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

        public boolean queueResetTask(AFrameTask task)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.

        Returns:
        boolean True if the task was successfully queued.
